options.label: A
options.text: 3 years old

options.label: B
options.text: 5 years old

options.label: C
options.text: 10 years old

options.label: D
options.text: 18 years old

multiple-choice.question: What is the main issue with the question "What do you want to be when you grow up," according to the speaker?

options.label: A
options.text: It's too easy to answer

options.label: B
options.text: It doesn't allow for multiple interests

options.label: C
options.text: It's only asked of kids

options.label: D
options.text: It's only asked of adults

multiple-choice.question: What term does the speaker use to describe someone with many interests and creative pursuits?

options.label: A
options.text: Polymath

options.label: B
options.text: Multipotentialite

options.label: C
options.text: Renaissance person

options.label: D
options.text: Scanner

multiple-choice.question: What are the three multipotentialite superpowers mentioned in the transcript?

options.label: A
options.text: Idea synthesis, rapid learning, and adaptability

options.label: B
options.text: Idea synthesis, creativity, and problem-solving

options.label: C
options.text: Rapid learning, adaptability, and critical thinking

options.label: D
options.text: Idea synthesis, critical thinking, and creativity

multiple-choice.question: What is an example of idea synthesis mentioned in the transcript?

options.label: A
options.text: Combining two or more fields to create something new, like Sha Hwang and Rachel Binx's company Meshu

options.label: B
options.text: Focusing on one main interest

options.label: C
options.text: Being a specialist in one area

options.label: D
options.text: Being a generalist in many areas

multiple-choice.question: What is an example of rapid learning mentioned in the transcript?

options.label: A
options.text: Nora Dunn's ability to develop muscle memory as a child concert pianist

options.label: B
options.text: Nora Dunn's ability to learn the finer mechanics of sales as a financial planner

options.label: C
options.text: Nora Dunn's ability to write compelling pitches to editors

options.label: D
options.text: All of the above

multiple-choice.question: What is an example of adaptability mentioned in the transcript?

options.label: A
options.text: Abe Cajudo's ability to morph into whatever he needs to be in a given situation

options.label: B
options.text: Abe Cajudo's ability to specialize in one area

options.label: C
options.text: Abe Cajudo's ability to focus on one main interest

options.label: D
options.text: Abe Cajudo's ability to be a generalist in many areas

multiple-choice.question: According to the speaker, what skill is identified by Fast Company magazine as the single most important skill to develop in order to thrive in the 21st century?

options.label: A
options.text: Idea synthesis

options.label: B
options.text: Rapid learning

options.label: C
options.text: Adaptability

options.label: D
options.text: Creativity

multiple-choice.question: What is the speaker's message to multipotentialites?

options.label: A
options.text: To specialize and focus on one main interest

options.label: B
options.text: To follow their curiosity and explore their intersections

options.label: C
options.text: To be more like their specialist peers

options.label: D
options.text: To be ashamed of their many passions

multiple-choice.question: According to the speaker, what is the importance of embracing one's inner wiring?

options.label: A
options.text: It leads to a happier, more authentic life

options.label: B
options.text: It leads to a more successful career

options.label: C
options.text: It leads to a more stable life

options.label: D
options.text: It leads to a more predictable life
